name: AffiliateImporterEb
author: CR1000Team

sections.description:
AffiliateImporterEb is a plugin that used to import products from Ebay Into your WordPress WooCommerce Affilate store. The plugin is helpful to collect affilate.

Plugin will import selected products from Ebay and push them to your WooCommerce store.

This plugin based on the official Ebay API.

Main features:

  • Unlimited number of products on your web-site.

  • Statistics:
    – the number of hits for each product
    – the number of redirected customers

  • Backup/restore options. Save your settings and products. You can restore your settings at any time with this option.

  • Pending posts. You will be able to save time by automatically updating products for your customers.

  • Support. You have access to technical support, tutorials and videos – if you have any problem we will solve it in 24 hours!

  • Currency / language. You can make money throughout the world by uploading variety of languages and currency.

  • Very easy and understandable visual interface. Plugin has clear visual interface and convenient for both skilled and beginner users.
sections.installation:
1. Install WooCommerce plugin.
    1. Upload AffiliateImporterEb plugin files to the plugin (commonly /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name) directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
    2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
    3. Use the AMimporter->Settings->Ebay setting Tab ->Enter Access Key ID,Secret Access Key,choose Associate Tag,choose Default site and press Save Setings.

You may pick up Ebay Access Key ID and Secret Access Key this link

short_description: This plugin allows you to import the products directly from Ebay in your Wordpress WooCommerce store and earn a commission!
